thread.title: Great location, nice hotel
thread.title_full: Great location, nice hotel - Review of 1K Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: figmolly
title: Great location, nice hotel
text:
We were pleased with our pick of the 1K for our first stay in Paris.
Pluses:
Location - loved the area, surrounded by so many great restaurants/wine bars, but not super touristy
Cleanliness - our room was kept very clean
Okays:
The rooms are pretty small, but I imagine this is the case with many hotels in Paris (as in most big cities).
Wifi - Great most of the time, but strangely disconnected at certain times. When we called the front desk to ask we were just told to log-in to another room's Wifi (they are all separate) which seemed like an odd solution.
Staff - Overall the staff was great, but we did have a few weird experiences. The one time we visited the bar the bartender seemed a little annoyed that we ordered food (he was busy with a large party so that is likely the reason, not a huge deal); the front desk gentleman at checkout seemed a bit confused and charged me the wrong amount for tax at first then told me I hadn't paid yet, he also didn't know the main Wifi password so we were not able to summon an Uber from the lobby.
Negatives -
Nothing really bad to say. A good place to stay in Paris!
